Description:
Did you have some protected page you dont want to index in search engines?
And you dont have idea what is a robots.txt file and dont want to handle with codes?
Just use this module...
This module let you block the index of your page in the most popular search engines...
Just select the search engine you want to protect and what kind of things you dont want to index...
Supported Search Engines:
Google
Yahoo
Ask
MSN/Live
Supported types of Block:
Images Block
Page Block
Cached Pages Block
Follow Link Block

Now its easy to do blocks to robots...
Try it!

There are some guidance that can be useful to you in order to config your module

Start with this module:



Robot Selection

1st Select in the "Robot to Block:" field one robot you want to hide your page from.
If you want to hide your content from all ROBOTS you select All Bots
If you want to add more than one robot but not all you should copy this module and set it with another robot!


Type of Block Selection

You have 4 main options for blocks:
PAGE - Will block all the page to be indexed
FOLLOW LINKS - Will block the index of your page Follow Links
CACHED PAGES - Will block the search engine to show a cached copy of your page
IMAGES- Just block images to be indexed

You have to select the type of block you want.
If you just want to add one type of block you musst have all other fields than "Elements to Block 1:" with "Empty" label.
For example if you want to add images block it will look like:
Elements to Block 1: IMAGES
Elements to Block 2: EMPTY
Elements to Block 3: EMPTY
Elements to Block 4: EMPTY

But if you want to add more than one type of block just select them in each field.
For example if you want to add FOLLOW Links and CACHED Pages Block it will look like:
Elements to Block 1: FOLLOW LINKS
Elements to Block 2: CACHED PAGES
Elements to Block 3: EMPTY
Elements to Block 4: EMPTY
Please make sure all the fields than the ones you want to select be: "EMPTY"!


Publish

You can publish that module in any position you want. Just make sure that "Show title:" parameter is set to "no"
This module will not produce any visual effect in your website
